message:
SYSTEM: 01-ModelosRazonam_-_Intro_%26_DynaLearn_Nov2012.pdf: Página 28
Semantic Techniques in DynaLearn
• Collaborative filtering for (subjective) 
community-driven recommendation. E.g.:
•
“Users who liked model X also liked model Y” 
•
“Users who modeled X also modeled Y”
• Model-based. Recommendations based on 
the properties of the model under an 
objective perspective. E.g.:
•
“Find a model fragment with inverse behaviour to the current one”
•
“List all models which are more specific than the current one”
28
speaker: SYSTEM
